suite.name: TestCasesAPIRequests

test.name: Cenário 01: Consulta de endereço existente

kw.name: Dado que esteja conectado no webservice de consultas de CEP
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=consultaCEP, url=https://webmaniabr.com/api/1/cep, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Quando o usuário consultar o CEP "06243-010"
kw.sourcename: Quando o usuário consultar o CEP "${CEP_CONSULTADO}"

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: You might have an = symbol in url. You better place 'url=' before, example: 'url=/your-url/foo?param=a' or use '/your-url/foo params=param=a' or escape it
TypeError: get_on_session() missing 1 required positional argument: 'url'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Então deve ser mostrado o endereço "Rua Pio XII"
kw.sourcename: Então deve ser mostrado o endereço "${ENDERECO}"

kw.name: E deve ser mostrado o bairro "Jardim Elvira"
kw.sourcename: E deve ser mostrado o bairro "${BAIRRO}"

kw.name: E deve ser mostrada a cidade "Osasco"
kw.sourcename: E deve ser mostrada a cidade "${CIDADE}"

kw.name: E deve ser mostrada a UF "SP"
kw.sourcename: E deve ser mostrada a UF "${UF}"

kw.name: E deve ser mostrado o CEP "06243010"
kw.sourcename: E deve ser mostrado o CEP "${CEP}"

test.status: TypeError: get_on_session() missing 1 required positional argument: 'url'

test.name: Cenário 02: Consulta de endereço inexistente

kw.name: Dado que esteja conectado no webservice de consultas de CEP
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=consultaCEP, url=https://webmaniabr.com/api/1/cep, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: You might have an = symbol in url. You better place 'url=' before, example: 'url=/your-url/foo?param=a' or use '/your-url/foo params=param=a' or escape it
TypeError: get_on_session() missing 1 required positional argument: 'url'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Então a mensagem "CEP INVÁLIDO" deve ser retornada
kw.sourcename: Então a mensagem "${ERROR_MSG}" deve ser retornada

test.status: TypeError: get_on_session() missing 1 required positional argument: 'url'
